p: Crude T. simplex extracts of various polarities were used to determine their antioxidant activities via a modified DPPH assay [ 11, [19], [20], [21]]. After 1.5 h incubation, the absorbance was measured and the percentage of inhibition (%) was calculated for each extract. Ethyl acetate extract showed the highest antioxidant activity, and hexane extract showed the lowest antioxidant activity ( Table 2). Antioxidant activity of the extracts decreased in the order of ethyl acetate > DCM > water > butanol > methanol > hexane ( Table 2).
